part.p: A projectile is launched horizontally from a certain height. The horizontal range of the flight equals the initial height. What angle \(\theta\) does the landing velocity make with the horizontal?

choicegroup.choice: The problem is impossible to solve; the missing information is the initial height only.
The problem is impossible to solve; the missing information is the value of g only.
The problem is impossible to solve; the missing information is the initial velocity only.
The problem is impossible to solve; the missing information is the initial height and the initial velocity.
The problem is impossible to solve; the missing information is the initial height and the value of g.
The problem is impossible to solve; the missing information is the initial velocity and the value of g.
